job_title: National Sales Manager in Tampa, FL
pros: Fantastic people, great and established brand
cons: poor production management and little marketing

review_title: Company changed my job within the first three months and headed in a direction I was not comfortable with.
job_title: Service Coordinator for TBI Program in Albany, NY
pros: Company offers excellent health benefits.  Pay is excellent for all their positions.  The company does not have a lot of competition in the field of service for Traumatic Brain Injury Services and is expanding.
cons: Job changed within the first three months to servicing different clients with whom I had no experience or interest in working with.  Company did not have a secure network and required employees to make their own personal email addresses for business use.

pros:
Can make my own schd n hours 
And offer overtime anytime needed
cons: Workers don't come in to shifts and leaves other aides stuck at work for sometimes over 16hours
There are no downsides for me at all.
